TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi BindingCollectionEnumerator extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

Docs.summary: Supports a simple iteration over a binding collection in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Current { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the current element in the binding collection.
Docs.value: The current element in the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed
abstract member MoveNext : unit -> bool override this.MoveNext : unit -> bool

Docs.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.
Docs.returns: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed
abstract member Reset : unit -> unit override this.Reset : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
